title: Vanish
description: Can we ever escape our past?Blamed after her boyfriend’s tragic death, Alyssa flees her small town and seeks refuge with her aunt, a Wicca High Priestess, in New York City.Alyssa doesn’t believe in magic, not anymore. As she makes new friends and develops a crush on Ronan, a cool saxophonist, she must figure out if she can truly leave her old life behind or will the past continue to haunt her?
author: Nicola Marsh
